author: BulkFan98
title: Kids, Look! It's Meltdown's Evil Ripoff!
review:
This set is part of Hero factory's 4.0 "Breakout"-type theme.

 

Pros:

Easy to bulid.

Good for hours of playtime.

Has a funny name.

 

Cons:

Too easy to bulid perhaps? Don't we want to be challenged?

Doesn't look too cool from the side.

The name is a bit too "Gangsta" for my tastes.

It's a ripoff of Meltdown. It's true! Look!: [img]http://images.wikia.com/herofactory/images/6/64/Meltdown.jpg[/img]

 

Overall I'd say get the origanal. It looks cooler and has a better name.

author: Rocka_3_0
title: Toxic Toxic Reapa!
review:
I got Toxic Reapa at Target recently, and I love this guy! Now before you die of bordom reading this lets get to the review.

Bag/Instructions

I LOVE the new bags! There's just some exitment when you pick them up and look at them, doesn't make much sense, does it?

Instructions where fine.

Parts

This is an awesome parts pack! So many awesome pieces! Including his head, trans armor shells, green SP III flames, and round shoulder armor!

The build

This build is accually pretty fun, it's not the normal humanoid type, it's more of a hunchback type build. You use some pretty awesome parts too!

The completed model

Reapa here looks really Awe-err-EVIL! The only con is the lower half of his body is kinda bland.

Summary

I really like Toxic Reapa, he's a great parts pack or villain for any Bionicle or Hero factory fan... and for anyone who likes green!
